<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ui_theme"><sys_ui_theme action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><css>/* Header Colors */
/* Search text color */ 
$search-text-color: #eee
/* Topbar background color*/
$navpage-header-bg: #0058A3
/* Topbar text color */
$navpage-header-color: #fff
/* Bottom border color on topbar */ 
$navpage-header-divider-color: #112741

/* Left nav and navigation toolbar background color */
/* Navigator hover color */
$nav-highlight-main: #244973
/* Background for expanded navigation items */
$subnav-background-color: #5596D0
/* Backgorund for navigator (left side only). */
$navpage-nav-bg: #CC2031
/* Background for Favorites list, history list, and Connect list background. */
$navpage-nav-bg-sub: #3A73B5
/* Text color in main navigation */
$navpage-nav-color-sub: #fff
/* Text color when hovering over items in main nav */
$navpage-nav-mod-text-hover: #fff
/* Divider color in Navigator */
$nav-hr-color: #244D81

/* Navigator tabs */
/* Active nav item underneath search */
$nav-highlight-bar-active: #3A93FA
/* Inactive nav items underneath search */
$nav-highlight-bar-inactive: #8DAECB
/* Background for currently selected navigation item underneath search */
$navpage-nav-selected-bg: #ADD5F5
/* Color of icon for currently active nav item. */
$navpage-nav-selected-color: #285080
/* Color of icons for non inactive nav items.*/
$navpage-nav-unselected-color: #ADD5F5

/* Navigator Application text */
/* Color for latest connect messages in right bar. */
$connect-latest-message: #c2d6ff
/* Timestamp header backgrounds in History tab*/
$nav-timeago-header-color: #316198
/* Core content text color */
$navpage-nav-app-text: #fff
/* Core content text color hover*/
$navpage-nav-app-text-hover: #fff

/* Color of outline for search */
$navpage-nav-border: #8cbaf2
</css><device>concourse</device><name>APG</name><sys_class_name>sys_ui_theme</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2015-11-18 18:25:39</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>ea2ebcfd4f330200423330318110c7a8</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>APG</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ui_theme_ea2ebcfd4f330200423330318110c7a8</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2015-12-11 15:24:29</sys_updated_on></sys_ui_theme></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_transform_map_6bb3f3784fd8d600423330318110c7dc
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_map"><sys_transform_map action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><copy_empty_fields>false</copy_empty_fields><enforce_mandatory_fields>No</enforce_mandatory_fields><name>Service Puppet Changes</name><order>100</order><run_business_rules>true</run_business_rules><run_script>true</run_script><script><![CDATA[(function transformRow(source, target, map, log, isUpdate) {

	
	// Find CI and set in target record.
	var ci = getCI(source.u_host);
	if(ci){
		target.u_ci = ci;
	}else{
		error = true;
		error_message = "Host ("+source.u_host+") not found in the CMDB";
	}

	
	//check to see if configuration is changed
	if(source.u_status == 'changed'){
		var latestVersion = getLatestVersion(ci);
		// If there was a previous version check if config was the same. If so somebody changed something that puppet fixed.
		if(latestVersion && (latestVersion == source.u_configuration_version)){
			target.u_enforced = true;
			//Create Incident
		}else{
			gs.log('test1');
			// New version, check if an open change is detected.
			var change = getActiveChange(ci);
			if(change){
				target.u_change=change;
			}
		}	
	}
	
})(source, target, map, log, action==="update");

function getActiveChange(ci){
	var gr = new GlideRecord('task_ci');
	gr.addQuery('ci_item',ci);
	gr.addQuery('task.active',true);
	gr.addQuery('task.sys_class_name','change_request');
	gr.setLimit(1);
	gr.query();
	while(gr.next()){
		return gr.task.sys_id;
	}
}

function getLatestVersion(ci){
	var gr = new GlideRecord('u_puppet_changes');
	gr.addQuery('u_ci',ci);
	gr.orderBy('created');
	gr.setLimit(1);
	gr.query();
	while(gr.next()){
		return gr.u_catalog_version;		
	}
}

function getCI(host){
	var gr = new GlideRecord('cmdb_ci');
	gr.addQuery('name',host);
	gr.query();
	while(gr.next()){
		return gr.sys_id;
	}
}]]></script><source_table>u_service_puppet_changes</source_table><sys_class_name>sys_transform_map</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2015-12-11 01:36:43</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>6bb3f3784fd8d600423330318110c7dc</sys_id><sys_mod_count>14</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Service Puppet Changes</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_transform_map_6bb3f3784fd8d600423330318110c7dc</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2015-12-11 12:51:46</sys_updated_on><target_table>u_puppet_changes</target_table></sys_transform_map></record_update>
